languages.text: {n}Взгляд сервитора оживает, когда вы приближаетесь. Он смотрит на вас выжидательно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The servitor's gaze becomes more animated as you approach. It looks at you expectantly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le regard du servitor s'anime à mesure que vous vous approchez, comme s'il attendait quelque chose de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's gaze becomes more animated as you approach. It looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard du servitor s'anime à mesure que vous vous approchez, comme s'il attendait quelque chose de vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你走近时，机仆的眼神变得充满活力，期待地看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's gaze becomes more animated as you approach. It looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你走近时，奴工的眼神变得充满活力，期待地看着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Blick des Servitors wird lebendiger, als du dich näherst. Er sieht dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's gaze becomes more animated as you approach. It looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Blick des Servitors wird lebendiger, als du dich näherst. Er sieht dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mirada del servidor se vuelve más animada a medida que te acercas. Te observa con expectación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's gaze becomes more animated as you approach. It looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada del servidor se vuelve más animada a medida que te acercas. Te observa con expectación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}こちらが接近すると、サーヴィターの視線はより生き生きとしはじめた。期待に満ちた眼差しでこちらを見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's gaze becomes more animated as you approach. It looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}こちらが接近すると、サーヴィターの視線はより生き生きとしはじめた。期待に満ちた眼差しでこちらを見ている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sen yaklaştıkça hizmetörün bakışları da hareketleniyor. Beklentiyle sana bakıyor.{/n}
